Description.Text: D-Resort Sibenik is a modern 4-star superior property offering relaxing accommodation near the heart of Sibenik. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, luxury spa centre, a gym, onsite dining, and a great location overlooking the marina. Sibenik is a historic town situated in central Dalmatia along the Adriatic Sea. Places of interest include the Cathedral of St. James, St. Nicholas Fortress and Krka National Park. Sibenik train station provides fast and easy access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, a gym, and a luxury spa centre featuring massage and beauty treatment rooms, saunas, and a steam room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are 29-35sqm and decorated in a modern style with light colours and vibrant artwork. They offer waterfront views from a balcony. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe, and an en-suite bathroom. Art Restaurant & Bar serves international dishes in a relaxing setting. The Yacht Club offers Mediterranean and Asian fusion cuisine in elegant surroundings with views over the D-Marin Mandalina marina. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
